ygData.subject: RE: Bug warning! Angstlich's Appalling Screech
ygData.msgSnippet: i remember that.  tho having a bard in your group pumping up everyone s MR helped immensely from what i remember.  lots of charm resists.  also remember having
ygData.messageBody:
i remember that. tho having a bard in your group pumping up everyone's MR
helped immensely from what i remember. lots of charm resists. also
remember having it take forever to START a 6 person group in there. we'd be
the only group in the zone. oh well the good ole days.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L34 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> The change in popularity happened when charm was taken away
> from pc and
> npc shaman. Before that, Sol B as very deadly, even more so than Lower
> Guk. Before that, on our server, if you went there it was
> only a matter
> of time before your tanks got charmed and a chunk of your party was
> wiped out. Removing charm from them made the dungeon majorly
> easier than
> it was before and once that happened it became popular fast.
